job_title: Care Coordinator in New York, NY
pros: The agency promotes and exhibits the following: Respectful, Understanding, Flexible, Professional and Considerate.
cons: There are counselors, social workers, and employees and then there are the supervisors above them. There is not much room for growth or promotion to a higher position as it is a small agency, and supervisors do not leave or retire.

job_title: Residential Monitor in New York, NY
pros: Clean building to work in update with covid 19 standards. Staff is professional and polite.
cons: Tenants have more rights than staff, they can curse you out disrespect you as an employee. High levels of mental illness with tenants must always be on the look out.
